edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientepisodicmemory
Class TemImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.LidaModuleImpl
      edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientepisodicmemory.TemImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saveable, Initializable, LidaModule, ModuleListener, BroadcastListener, CueListener, TransientEpisodicMemory
public class TemImpl
extends LidaModuleImpl
implements TransientEpisodicMemory, BroadcastListener, CueListener

This is the cannonical implementation of TEM. It uses a sparse distributed memory to store the information.

Author:
Javier Snaider
